description_html:
Metáfora Collection tips its floppy hat to that gone by era of glitz, glam rock, and hippie chic. Offering a modern
interpretation of the best of the 70’s; touches of macramé, pointed collars and flared trousers can be seen throughout the patterns, bringing a retro modern twist to the collection while showcasing a fresh up to date feel with the beautifully synchronized colors. A contemporary twist on iconic trends of the past, the Metáfora Collection creates a statement that is both eye-catching and classic. Inspired by modern retro design, The Metáfora Collection creates a contemporary feel with a touch of nostalgia by layering striking shapes, textures and clean lines. A stunning mix of geometric, abstract and textural patterns, reminiscent of popular retro style, pair beautifully together or alone in an interior space. The sophisticated color palette includes an array of warm and cool grays, luxurious taupes and calming blues, plus bright hues such as paprika, lime and azure. The Metáfora Collection is manufactured with Antron® Lumena™ solution dyed 6,6 nylon and produced on
state-of-the-art Atlas Interloop technology which allows for superior product performance and quality. All of the broadloom products come standard with Permian Bac™ backing and tiles comes standard with Perma-Tile Vinyl backing, which offer multiple benefits including improved moisture resistance and better protection for wet cleaning applications and spills.
